content.text:
Hey [@Wanderlustking](@upi9szJ7vDj34hsgTQQtj9Ki2rURgFJSZmb3d7YdU5k=.ed25519), welcome!

I think [@kp](@LVL4qjvmws3Cxavfi4iCQI6dSOqWqOyq5/5CHImILA8=.ed25519) might be active on sunbeam.city? I'm not sure, I was on social.coop before things sort of imploded.

I really love your grocery wagon, I don't think I've ever seen panniers like yours -- they remind me of the cargo net you often see in the back of some hatchback vehicles, I bet they're super convenient. I can already tell you'll be popular in #cats. Looking forward to getting to know you!
